alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Howard; Merrick; Nance (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 4:47PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Nance, northeastern Hamilton, Merrick and southeastern Howard Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 447 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near St. Paul to near Archer to near Central City. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Archer around 450 PM CDT. Central City and Clarks around 455 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Hordville and St. Libory. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
